p: The reported protective effect of dry matter against stress tolerance [ 38] did not occur in the present experiment and even the TDS values did not statistically differ between the AMF-inoculated plants and the control ( Table 1). Contrastingly, the content of essential oil, which was shown to have beneficial effects in protecting plants against abiotic and biotic stress [ 40], increased only in AMF-treated lavender compared to the untreated control ( Table 1).
